author: Omkar Godbole
title: Bitcoin at $200K by Year-End is Now Firmly in Play, Analyst Says After Muted U.S. Inflation Data
description: The CPI missed estimates Wednesday, easing concerns of a tariff-led upswing in price pressures.
content:
Wednesday's softer-than-expected U.S. inflation has likely set the stage for accelerated gains in bitcoin 
, potentially to $200,000 by the end of the year, according to Matt Mena, crypto research s… [+2442 chars]
